events.title: Annual Team Building Activity
events.description: Join us for a day of fun activities designed to build team cohesion and foster a collaborative work environment. Lunch and refreshments will be provided.

events.title: Quarterly Business Review
events.description: The management will present the business performance for the last quarter. Employees are encouraged to participate and share their thoughts and feedback.

events.title: Hackathon
events.description: A full-day coding event where teams compete to solve problems and build innovative solutions. Prizes will be awarded to the top three teams.

announcements.title: Office Renovation
announcements.details: The office will undergo renovations to improve facilities. Temporary workspace arrangements will be provided. Please cooperate with the administration during this period.

announcements.title: New Health Insurance Policy
announcements.details: Our company has updated the health insurance policy to provide better coverage. Details will be shared in an upcoming meeting. Please review the policy documents sent via email.

announcements.title: Remote Work Policy
announcements.details: Starting next month, employees can opt for remote work up to two days a week. Please discuss with your manager to plan your schedule accordingly.
